critique: The document aims to establish a committee to investigate subversive activities. As the President, I would want to elicit a sense of security and confidence in the government's ability to handle threats. The language is formal and authoritative, suggesting a serious and measured approach. The emphasis on fair and prompt disposition of complaints aims to reassure the public that due process will be followed. The mention of war and national emergency introduces an element of fear, but it is balanced by the promise of special action to ensure internal security. The initial scores reflect these considerations.
